title: Visionary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose three players to Test.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Tested players will be informed. In addition to their usual abilities, they can choose to amputate any number of limbs, from 0-3. For each limb amputated, they blackmail themselves for a day.
- The player who amputated the most number of limbs becomes Enlightened, gaining a basic auto-vest. If players tie, no one is Enlightened.
- Evil players are informed of the other players in the test.
- If an evil player is Enlightened, they can instead choose another player in the test to blackmail.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Enlighten three players, at least one of which must be evil.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
